name: VR health care (aerobic exercise): VR sport and cycling in Maya gardens
name_original: VR health care (aerobic exercise): VR sport and cycling in Maya gardens
description:
VR health care (aerobic exercise): VR sport and cycling in Maya gardens. Enjoy the VR scenery while exercising and forget the fatigue of exercising. Get fun and keep fit.



Rule: Simply hold your controller, and run, to get a VR ride in Maya Gardens. Or maybe you can use a vive tracker, strap it to your ankle, and ride on a spinning bike machine, to get better experience.
